      • recordNewPatchesInDir

        public static void recordNewPatchesInDir(java.lang.String appPath,
                                         java.io.File dir,
                                         java.util.Set<java.lang.String> patchNames,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AmpXmlPatch> patchesMap)
                                  throws DgException
        Finds and saves to db all new patch names and locations, that were not recorded previously.
        Parameters:
        dir - the dir to seek for unrecorded patches
        patchNames - the existing patch names
        appPath - the application Path - usually serviceContext.getRealPath("/")
        patchesMap - the already discovered patches
        Throws:
        DgException

      • computePatchFileLocation

        public static java.lang.String computePatchFileLocation(java.io.File patchFile,
                                                        java.lang.String appPath)
        Gets the location parameter saved with AmpXmlPatch based on the patch File and the appPath
        Parameters:
        patchFile - the File object for the patch as it has been found
        appPath - the application Path - usually serviceContext.getRealPath("/")
        Returns:

      • isSQLCompatible

        public static boolean isSQLCompatible(java.lang.String langType)
        Checks if the jdbc connection is compatible with the given language type. This will check if the language type is part of the URL of the connection. Example language type "oracle". The oracle string should always be part of the jdbc URL
        Returns:
        true if the langType is compatible with the connection

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        Gets the JDBC connection out of the Session Factory. Do not get the connection directly from the session (org.hibernate.session.Session#connection is deprecated)
        Returns:
        the connection object

      • discoverPatchDirs

        public static java.util.Set<java.io.File> discoverPatchDirs(java.lang.String root)
        Seeks the application directories in search of patch directories. The usual location is inside the modules dir (repository/modulename/xmlpatches). However this is not hardcoded. One usual location that is outside /repository/ is the generic patches dir (that do not belong to one specific module)
        Parameters:
        root - the root dir to start searching
        Returns:
        a set of FileS that represent discovered patch directories

      • getAllDiscoveredPatchNames

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllDiscoveredPatchNames()
                                                                  throws DgException,
                                                                         org.hibernate.HibernateException,
                                                                         java.sql.SQLException
        Gets all the patch names which are also the primary keys, of all discovered patches.
        Returns:
        a set with the patch names, naturally ordered
        Throws:
        DgException
        java.sql.SQLException
        org.hibernate.HibernateException

      • getUnmarshalledPatch

        public static Patch getUnmarshalledPatch(ServiceContext serviceContext,
                                         AmpXmlPatch p,
                                         AmpXmlPatchLog log)
        Unmarshalls using JAXB the xml file that the AmpXmlPatch object points to
        Parameters:
        serviceContext -
        p - the patch file metaobject that holds the location URI
        log -
        serviceContext - the service context of the caller servlet, used to get the real application path the patch log file that will be written in the end to the db
        Returns:
        the Patch object, unmarshalled

        Adds a new log object to an existing patch object
        Parameters:
        p - the existing patch object, this will be re-fetched from db to get a lazy version

        serviceContext -
        Returns:

      • applyDeprecationTags

        public static void applyDeprecationTags(Patch p,
                                        AmpXmlPatchLog log)
                                 throws org.hibernate.HibernateException,
                                        java.sql.SQLException
        Checks if the current patch is deprecating other patches (has deprecate tags). If so, it deprecates those patches. This is run BEFORE the actual patch execution is invoked, thus it prevents deprecated patches to ever be applied.
        Parameters:
        p -
        log -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        org.hibernate.HibernateException

      • getAllDiscoveredUnclosedPatches

        public static java.util.List<AmpXmlPatch> getAllDiscoveredUnclosedPatches()
                                                                   throws DgException,
                                                                          org.hibernate.HibernateException,
                                                                          java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the list of XmlPatches that are not in close state
        Returns:
        the Hibernate query result
        Throws:
        DgException
        org.hibernate.HibernateException
        java.sql.SQLException
        See Also:
        XmlPatcherConstants.PatchStates
